Meta.title: moarexp

Meta.description:
ï»¿Multiplier for experience and potential gain.
[h3]How to configure[/h3] The configuration file will be generated after the game is launched. Close the game and edit the settings file, which is located at: [i]/steamapps/common/Elin/BepInEx/config/hvits3rk.experiencemultiplier.cfg[/i]
